WRITING.TITLE: Trying to get a clean/clear TRT Blood Test, after LGD/Torem + MK677 cycle.
WRITING.TEXT:
Finished an LGD cycle with Torem for PCT (last day March 7th) Been running MK677 on the background for the last 4 months...and still on it. i have scheduled a blood work with a TRT clinic on April 3rd and i want to get a clear / true results as possible.
Can you guys help me guesstimate the following questions?
- How many days before blood test should i stop MK677 to get a true reading?
- Blood test scheduled for 1 month after last Torem dosage, do you guys think is enough time to get a true reading?
thanks!
EDIT: The final question being: if i stopped everything today, how long will it take to the body to go back to normal levels so i can get proper readings and plan accordingly with better knowledge. (I realize i should have done this before anything else to get a baseline, i wanted to test the waters and see how my body reacted to the compounds ) i am trying to get things proper now, so your knowledge and/or advice is appreciated. Thanks!
